title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 49 - Shellfish Management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 49 - Shellfish Management

State Regulations
§ 49.1 - Bay scallops (argopecten irradians)
§ 49.2 - Oysters (family ostreidae)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 49

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§13-0316, 13-0319, 13-0323, 13-0327

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
